citation.article-title: Reclassification of Paralactobacillus selangorensis Leisner et al. 2000 as Lactobacillus selangorensis comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Lactobacillus selangorensis comb. nov.
Lactobacillus selangorensis (sel.an.gor′en.sis. M.L. adj. selangorensis belonging to the province of Selangor, Malaysia).
Basonym: Paralactobacillus selangorensis Leisner et al. 2000.

The description for the species remains as described by Leisner et al. (2000), with the description of the genus Paralactobacillus (Leisner et al., 2000) being the description of Lactobacillus selangorensis.
The type strain is ATCC BAA-66T ( = LMG 17710T = CIP 106482T).
